categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures is an ongoing monthly magazine published by Egmont UK Ltd in the United Kingdom. The magazine features a range of various different Star Wars themed free gifts each month. Each issue includes comics, puzzles and competitions to win prizes. The content of the magazine includes that of the original trilogy, Star Wars: The Clone Wars, and the Star Wars: Rebels TV Series. The first issue of the magazine debuted on July 15, 2015 in the UK.
